title: Applying the EPIC Approach for Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental organizational management comprehension and work experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in digitally equipped classrooms, emphasizing collaborative learning based on practical case studies

learning_goals: Can explain the four core elements of the EPIC approach (Education, Perseverance, Innovation, Collaboration) in organizational digital transformation contexts
Can apply real workplace problems to the EPIC framework to design and implement improvement plans
Can propose strategies for fostering an organizational learning culture through continuous peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
